summary: At the end of the 20th century in Europe, the social climate is on a downward slide and unemployment is rife. The situation affects the lives of a couple, Anton and Leni, who live together in an unnamed city.
cast: Adolfo Assor|Thomas Baumann|Isa Hochgerner|Verena Jasch|Wolfgang Michael|Urs Remond|Daniela Roque-Magalhaes
keywords: cigarette smoking|sex in a car|swan|sex scene|bar
title: Abendland
